metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45188 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - high
metadata.Description:
Netatalk through 3.1.13 has an afp_getappl heap-based buffer overflowresulting in code execution via a crafted .appl file. This provides remoteroot access on some platforms such as FreeBSD (used for TrueNAS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45188` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

netatalk - 3.1.12~ds-9ubuntu0.22.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: netatalk package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.12~ds-9ubuntu0.22.04.1').
